description:
Optimized for webOS, PressReader delivers over 1,900 full-content newspapers from 95 countries to the HP TouchPad in just one app!  Download PressReader today and receive 7 trial issues for FREE!*
With PressReader, users enjoy complete digital replicas of their favorite publications, often before printed editions hit the newsstands.   Every article, advertisement, puzzle and cartoon is presented in its original context.  Choose from a growing list of the world's most popular publications, including:
• The Washington Post
• USA Today
• Los Angeles Times
• Chicago Tribune
• Philadelphia Inquirer
• International Herald Tribune
• Globe and Mail
• National Post
• Vancouver Sun
• Irish Independent
• Irish Times
• Daily Mail
• The Herald
• Hamburger Morgenpost
• Der Tagesspiegel
• Il Messaggero
• Bangkok Post
• Kommersant 
...to name just a few. 
With PressReader, you can hold the digital edition of your favorite publication in your hands and read it from cover to cover, just the way the title was printed — with no compromises in quality, fidelity or content. 
Features:
• Set up automated subscriptions to your favorite titles
• Flip pages like you're reading real publications
• Pan and zoom articles and photos in portrait or landscape mode
• Easily browse publications and supplements
• Authorize PressReader as part of your PressDisplay.com subscription
*All trial issues downloaded will be paid for by NewspaperDirect in compliance with auditing rules for paid digital editions. 
Additional titles can be purchased individually for $0.99 per issue, or downloaded in conjunction with a  paid subscription on PressDisplay.com.
